knownBlockerTests.test: Homepage mobile hamburger menu not opening
knownBlockerTests.evidence: Mobile menu JS handler present in main.js:85-132. CSS .mobile-open class properly defined in styles.css:1494
knownBlockerTests.notes: Click handler toggles .mobile-open class. CSS shows display:flex when .mobile-open is applied.

knownBlockerTests.test: Homepage sell-only calculator slider fill (yellow) not tracking thumb
knownBlockerTests.evidence: updateSliderTrack function in main.js:76-82 sets --value CSS variable. CSS styles.css:1703 uses linear-gradient with var(--value)
knownBlockerTests.notes: Slider fill uses CSS custom property --value which is updated on input event.

knownBlockerTests.test: Any internal links still using .html variants
knownBlockerTests.evidence: Internal navigation links use /path/ format. Canonical tags use .html format.
knownBlockerTests.notes: Internal links are correct. Issue is canonical/sitemap mismatch documented in ISS-001/ISS-002.

knownBlockerTests.test: Contact form showing required message before user interaction
knownBlockerTests.evidence: Error elements use style='display: none;' initially. JS shows them only on validation failure.
knownBlockerTests.notes: Form error messages hidden by default, shown only after failed validation.

knownBlockerTests.evidence: Honeypot fields use .form-hp class with CSS: position: absolute; left: -9999px; opacity: 0; height: 0; overflow: hidden;
knownBlockerTests.notes: Honeypot fields properly hidden from visual users while still present for bots.

hamburgerMenu.focusBehavior: Returns focus to menu button on Escape

forms.successState: Button text changes, success message shown
forms.errorState: Field borders red, error messages shown
